00036     void MatrixHelper::CutRowFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const uint &start,
00037         const uint &end)
00038       {
00039 
00040         try
00041           {
00042             if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->size()))
00043             throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,(int)D->size());
00044             D->erase(D->begin()+start, D->begin()+end);
00045           }
00046         catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00047           {
00048 
00049           }
00050       }
00051 
00052     void MatrixHelper::CutColumnFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const uint &start,
00053         const uint &end)
00054       {
00055 
00056         for (uint i=0; i<=D->size()-1; i++)
00057           {
00058             try
00059               {
00060                 if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->at(i).size()))
00061                 throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,D->at(i).size());
00062                 D->at(i).erase(D->at(i).begin()+start, D->at(i).begin()+end);
00063               }
00064             catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00065               {
00066 
00067               }
00068           }
00069       }

00071     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitializeScoreMatrixDistances(
00072         const bpp::Sequence* A, const bpp::Sequence* B,
00073         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00074       {
00075         //Initialize Score Matrix
00076         ScoreMatrix D = InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B,
00077             numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
00078 
00079         D.at(0).at(0) = 0;
00080 
00081         D.at(0).at(1) = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(0));
00082         +scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(0));
00083 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00084 #pragma omp parallel for
00085 #endif 
00086         for (uint i=2; i<D.at(0).size(); i++)
00087           D.at(0).at(i) = D.at(0).at(i-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(i-1));
00088 
00089         D.at(1).at(0) = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(0))
00090             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(0));
00091 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00092 #pragma omp parallel for
00093 #endif         
00094         for (uint i=2; i<D.size(); i++)
00095           D.at(i).at(0) = D.at(i-1).at(0) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00096 
00097         return D;
00098       }
00099 
00100     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitScoreMatrixWith(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00101         const bpp::Sequence* B, const double &init)
00102       {
00103         //Initialize Score Matrix
00104         ScoreMatrix P(A->size()+1, vector<double>(B->size() +1, init));
00105 
00106         return P;
00107       }
00108     ScoreMatrix3D MatrixHelper::InitScoreMatrix3DWith(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00109         const PseudoRotatedSequence* B, const int &delta, const double &init)
00110       {
00111         //B is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is B/2
00112         int slaps = B->size()/2;
00113         if (delta != 0)
00114           slaps /= delta;
00115 
00116         ScoreMatrix3D P(A->size()+1, vector< vector<double> >(B->size() +1,
00117             vector<double>(slaps, init)));
00118 
00119         return P;
00120       }

00122     BoolMatrix MatrixHelper::CreateAdjacenceGraph(
00123         Alignment* pairWiseAlignments, int biggestSequenceSize)
00124       {
00125         //Construct Graph as Adjacence Matrix
00126         valarray <bool> tmp(false, biggestSequenceSize);
00127         BoolMatrix G(tmp, pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences()/2);
00128 
00129         cout << "constructing Graph"<< endl;
00130         for (uint i=1; i<pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences(); i +=2)
00131           {
00132 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00133 #pragma omp parallel for shared(G)
00134 #endif 
00135             for (uint j=0; j<pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->size(); j++)
00136               {
00137                 //Check for match or not mismatch := !gap
00138                 if (pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->getValue(j) != -1)
00139                   G[i/2][j] = true;
00140                 else
00141                   G[i/2][j] = false;
00142               }
00143           }
00144 
00145         return G;
00146       }

00148     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInRow(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00149         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const uint &start, const uint &row)
00150       {
00151 
00152         int i = start;
00153         double minScore = M->at(row).at(start);
00154 
00155         for (uint k=1; k<start; k++)
00156           {
00157             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(row).at(k), minScore) != minScore)
00158               {
00159                 i = k;
00160                 minScore = M->at(row).at(k);
00161               }
00162           }
00163         return i;
00164 
00165       }
00166 
00167     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInRow3D(const ScoreMatrix3D* M,
00168         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const uint &start, const uint &row, uint &k)
00169       {
00170 
00171         int i = start;
00172         double minScore = M->at(row).at(start).at(k);
00173 
00174         for (uint p=1; p<start; p++)
00175           {
00176             for (uint t=k; t<M->at(row).at(start).size(); t++)
00177               if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(row).at(p).at(t), minScore) != minScore)
00178                 {
00179                   i = p;
00180                   minScore = M->at(row).at(p).at(t);
00181                   k= t;
00182                 }
00183           }
00184         return i;
00185 
00186       }

00188     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInColumn(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00189         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const uint &start, const uint &column)
00190       {
00191 
00192         int j = start;
00193         double minScore = M->at(start).at(column);
00194 
00195         for (uint k=1; k<start; k++)
00196           {
00197             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(k).at(column), minScore) != minScore)
00198               {
00199                 j = k;
00200                 minScore = M->at(k).at(column);
00201               }
00202           }
00203         return j;
00204       }
00205 
00206     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInColumn3D(const ScoreMatrix3D* M,
00207         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const uint &start, const uint &column,
00208         uint &k)
00209       {
00210 
00211         int j = start;
00212         double minScore = M->at(start).at(column).at(k);
00213 
00214         for (uint p=1; p<start; p++)
00215           for (uint l=k; l<M->at(p).at(column).size(); l++)
00216             {
00217               if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(p).at(column).at(l), minScore) != minScore)
00218                 {
00219                   j = p;
00220                   minScore = M->at(p).at(column).at(l);
00221                   k = l;
00222                 }
00223             }
00224         return j;
00225       }
00226 
00227     double MatrixHelper::SearchBestPositionFrom(const ScoreMatrix* M, uint &i,
00228         uint &j, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00229       {
00230 
00231         double minScore = M->at(i).at(j);
00232         int tempI = SearchBestInRow(M, scoreM, j, i);
00233         int tempJ = SearchBestInColumn(M, scoreM, i, j);
00234 
00235         if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(minScore, M->at(tempI).at(j)) != minScore)
00236           if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(tempI).at(j) , M->at(i).at(tempJ)) == M->at(i).at(tempJ))
00237             {
00238               j = tempJ;
00239               minScore = M->at(i).at(tempJ);
00240             }
00241           else
00242             {
00243               i = tempI;
00244               minScore = M->at(tempI).at(j);
00245             }
00246 
00247         return minScore;
00248       }
